narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This inspection report could not be completed on-site due to connectivity issues, and will be mailed to the licensee.
 
Exit interview conducted on-site with the facility representative.
Note:  Two fennec fox were off site today for medical reasons and were not inspected.
